revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 85:;Petheus, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora, copper drachmas 4;;Isidoros, son of Petheus, grandson of Isidoros, mother Dideis, drachmas 44;;Ninnaros alias Ptolemaios, his son, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 44;;Isidoros, son of Petheus;;camel tax of year 13 drachmas 75, surcharges drachmas 5, in total drachmas 80;;Diodora, daughter of Petheus (Dios, son of Panpin);;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 4 obols 3.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1;;(in left margin: drachmas 36 obols 16) eparourion drachmas 3 obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 25 obol 1.5;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 23 obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obol 0.5, in total drachmas 25 obol 1.5;;and to Petheus, son of Hatres;;naubion of kaotoikoi of year 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 2 chalki 2;;tax on land plots in release likewise obols 3, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 4;;Agathopos, slave of Thermouthis alias Tpaietis, copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Limnaios, grandson of Onnophris, mother Isidora, copper drachmas 8;;Soeris, daughter of Teos (through the agency of Phasis, son of Pakysis, wife);;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 2 obols 2 chalki 2, tax on the produce of oil obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 5) eparourion drachma 1 obols 3.5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 2.5 chalki 2;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 6, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 2.5;;Isidoros, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Petesouchos, his brother with the same mother, drachmas 8;;Orsenouphis, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Zoidous, copper drachmas 4;;Dioskoros, son of Petheus, grandson of Kollouthes, mother Taorsenouphis, copper drachmas 8;;Phaesis, son of Sisois, grandson of Phaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4, copper drachmas 4;;Didymion, son of Petheus the older, grandson of Didymion, mother Tasoucharion, copper drachmas 4;;Sokmenis, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Leonides, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, copper drachmas 8;;Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Dionysios, fatherless, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Harpagathes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, drachmas 24;;Valerius fatherless:;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 28) orchard taxes of year 12 drachmas 3 obol 0.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5 chalki 2, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 2 obol 0.5, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 7 obol 1;;Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, copper drachmas 4;;Herakles, his brother with the same mother, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Didymos, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 325 obols 11."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- BL VIII, 212 (on l. 3380) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
